about_the_game:
"The universe is in danger and you are the only one who can protect it! ..."

A game with good moments of fun and challenge in which progress happens little by little.

The player will have the feeling of achievement in every coin he collects. These coins are needed to make improvements and unlock new items and modes in the Space Store, but beware ... because the better the player attributes are, the bigger the challenge!

You'll face several obstacles in 04 different modes, with only one of them unlocked at the beginning of the game, two to be purchased in the store and a secret mode that needs to be unlocked. The first mode will be the default of the game for a good period until the player has enough skills and conditions to move forward.

In Bullets in the Space you will not have scores, your merits will be the coins collected in the game!

CHARACTERISTICS:

- Moments of fun, challenge and tension!
- Different spacecraft, each with shots and own attributes.
- Progressive (dynamic) difficulty in some moments of the game.
- Four modes: "Collection", "Survivor", "Rescue" and a "Secret" mode.
- Collection Mode [/]: Collect as many crystals within two minutes.
- Survivor Mode [/]: Only survive as long as possible.
- Rescue Mode [/]: Collect the missing survivors in space.
- Secret Mode [/]: "..."
